name: Archmage
damage_resistances: damage from spells; non magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (from stoneskin)

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
* 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell,fly, lightning bolt

descriptions.raw: * 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*

descriptions.raw: * 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force

descriptions: * The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
